text: Quimper () is a town in France. It is the prefecture of the Finistère department in the Brittany region. Its population is around 65,000 (2006). ==Sister cities== Quimper is twinned with: * Limerick, Ireland * Remscheid, Germany * Falkirk, Scotland * Ourense, Spain * Yantai, China Category:Communes in Finistère Category:Departmental capitals in France
title: Quimper
